languages.text: {n}Архмилитант с почтением протягивает вам свой необычного вида меч, не заботясь о том, чтобы стряхнуть с него свежую кровь.{/n} "Уверен, {mf|господин|госпожа} сможет вдоволь напоить этот клинок кровью своих врагов. Моему господину это было бы крайне... приятно". {n}На последней фразе Вортен щербато ухмыляется, и глаза его разгораются хищным пламенем.{/n}

{n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Архмилитант с почтением протягивает вам свой необычного вида меч, не заботясь о том, чтобы стряхнуть с него свежую кровь.{/n} "Уверен, {mf|господин|госпожа} сможет вдоволь напоить этот клинок кровью своих врагов. Моему господину это было бы крайне... приятно". {n}На последней фразе Вортен щербато ухмыляется, и глаза его разгораются хищным пламенем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Arch-militant reverently hands you his blade, not caring about shaking the fresh blood off of it.{/n} "I'm sure {mf|Master|Mistress} would sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My master would be quite... pleased." {n}Saying the last phrase, he gives you a dented grin and his eyes flicker with a predatory flame.{/n}

{n}The Arch-militant reverently hands you his blade, not caring about shaking the fresh blood off of it.{/n} "I'm sure {mf|Master|Mistress} would sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My master would be quite... pleased." {n}Saying the last phrase, he gives you a dented grin and his eyes flicker with a predatory flame.{/n}

My master would be quite... pleased." {n}Saying the last phrase, he gives you a dented grin and his eyes flicker with a predatory flame.{/n}

{n}The Arch-militant reverently hands you his blade, not caring about shaking the fresh blood off of it.{/n} "I'm sure {mf|Master|Mistress} would sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My master would be quite... pleased." {n}Saying the last phrase, he gives you a dented grin and his eyes flicker with a predatory flame.{/n}

{n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

{n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Archimilitante te entrega ceremoniosamente su espada, sin siquiera limpiarle la sangre fresca.{/n} «Deseo a mi{mf|lord|lady} que sacie esta hoja con la sangre de sus enemigos. Mi señor se sentiría muy... complacido». {n}Al pronunciar la última frase, te lanza media sonrisa y ves una llama salvaje en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El archimilitante te entrega ceremoniosamente su espada, sin molestarse en limpiarle antes la sangre fresca.{/n} «Estoy seguro de que mi {mf|señor|señora} bañará esta hoja con la sangre de sus enemigos. Mi amo se sentiría muy... complacido». {n}Al pronunciar la última frase, te mira sonriendo de soslayo con aire de depredador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}首席战士恭敬地把他的剑递给你，甚至都懒得把上面的鲜血甩掉。{/n}“愿大人您用敌人的鲜血来滋养这把剑，我的主人一定会非常……满意。”{n}说出最后一句话时，他对你露出了不祥的狞笑，眼中闪烁着邪恶的火花。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}首席战士恭敬地把他的剑递给你，甚至都懒得把上面的鲜血甩掉。{/n}“我相信，您会用敌人的鲜血来滋养这把剑。我的主人一定会非常……满意。”{n}说出最后一句话的时候，他对你露出了不祥的狞笑，眼中闪烁着掠食者般的火焰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'archimilitant vous tend son arme avec déférence, sans prendre la peine de nettoyer le sang frais dont elle est maculée.{/n} « Puissiez-vous la rassasier du sang de vos ennemis. Cela ferait grand plaisir à mon maître, » {n}dit-il en souriant de toutes ses dents, une lueur prédatrice dans les yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'archimilitant vous tend son arme avec déférence, sans toutefois prendre la peine de nettoyer le sang frais dont elle est maculée.{/n} « Je ne doute pas que vous saurez la rassasier du sang de vos ennemis. Cela ferait plaisir à mon maître, » {n}dit-il en souriant de toutes ses dents, une lueur prédatrice dans ses yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーク・ミリタントは、そこから鮮血を拭いさることもせずに、うやうやしくあなたに刃を手渡す。{/n} 「この刃を敵の血で満たしてください。我が主はさぞ…お喜びになることでしょう」{n}最後の言葉を紡ぐと、彼は残忍な笑みを浮かべ、その目に凶悪な炎をちらつかせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アーク・ミリタントは、そこから鮮血を拭いさることもせずに、うやうやしくあなたに刃を手渡す。{/n} 「この刃を敵の血で満たしてください。我が主はさぞ…お喜びになることでしょう」{n}最後の言葉を紡ぐと、彼は残忍な笑みを浮かべ、その目に凶悪な炎をちらつかせる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Erzmilitant überreicht dir feierlich seine Klinge, ohne zumindest das frische Blut davon abzuschütteln.{/n} "Möge {mf|der Meister|die Meisterin} diese Klinge mit dem Blut {mf|seiner|ihrer} Feinde sättigen. Mein Herr wäre höchst ... erfreut." {n}Bei diesem letzten Satz grinst er verächtlich, und eine böse Flamme flackert in seinen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Erzmilitant überreicht dir feierlich seine Klinge, ohne sich vorher die Mühe zu machen, das frische Blut davon abzuschütteln.{/n} "{mf|Der Meister|Die Meisterin} will diese Klinge doch gewiss mit dem Blut {mf|seiner|ihrer} Feinde sättigen. Mein Meister wäre höchst ... erfreut." {n}Beim letzten Satz grinst er dich schief an, und in seinen Augen flackert eine räuberische Flamme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başmilitan, üzerindeki sıcak kanı bile silkelemeden kılıcını sana hürmetle uzatıyor.{/n} "Efendisi, bu kılıcı düşmanlarının kanıyla beslesin. Lordum... Pek memnun olacaktır." {n}Son cümleyi söylerken sana alaycı, habis gözlerle bakıyor. Gözlerinde acımasız bir alev titreşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant reverently hands you his blade without even shaking the fresh blood off it.{/n} "May the {mf|master|mistress} sate this blade with the blood of {mf|his|her} enemies. My lord would be quite... pleased." {n}As he says this last phrase, he gives you a broken sneer, and a vicious flame flickers in his eyes.{/n}
